section.title: Some of our favorite tracking methods

subsection.title: Daily History Chart
subsection.p: The most effective way to track your releases, sprints and iterations is to use Mingle's Daily History Chart (a feature introduced in Mingle 3.2). It is a chart showing the increase (and decrease) of a numeric property over time e.g. the number of points of scope for stories in each card status over time.

subsection.title: Pivot Table
subsection.p: A pivot table is a great way to track your project. You can specify a property for your rows and a property for your columns to see your release, sprint or iteration from different perspectives.
